item.title: Announcing gophish v0.1.1
item.description: Tl;dr - Download the release here The wait is over! The gophish team is excited to announce our first public beta version of gophish - version 0.1.1! This blog post will be a short introduction into what gophish is, as well as some of the insanely awesome features we’ve created. What is Gophish? Gophish is a phishing framework that makes the simulation of real-world phishing attacks dead-simple. The idea behind gophish is simple â€“ make industry-grade phishing training available to everyone.
